title: Chipotle’s Health Scares Are Over. Here’s How Its CEO Is Preventing More.
text:
Shares of Chipotle Mexican Grill have climbed so far, and so quickly, from their early 2018 lows that it is sometimes easy to forget that a high-profile food-safety scare was one of the principal reasons the stock fell in the first place.

That scare was also part of what led to the hiring of Brian Niccol from Yum! Brands’ (ticker: YUM) Taco Bell to run Chipotle (CMG). He has presided over the shares recovery to, and beyond, their pre-scare levels by helping to revive the brand, sharpen store-level operations, and build a...
